work.name: ReMo

highlights: Built standardized GitHub Actions, accelerating model deployment from 2-3 weeks to 2-3 days and enabling faster production releases across data science teams
Switched all MLOps from AWS EC2 to AWS Lambda to save compute resources and reduce dependence on shared EC2 fleet.
Authored comprehensive documentation in Atlassian Confluence for CI/CD orchestration and maintenance within the MLOps template, improving developer onboarding and system reliability
work.summary: Hired to bring ML Deployment platform to the same best practices.

Held office hours, graded exams, tutored students, and proposed curriculum changes.
Took responsibility for several teams success, met with them each week assessed their needs and provided them with the relevant resources and insight from my own projects.
Mediated disputes within groups and fostered a culture of over communication.
work.summary: Hired as a Student Mentor Introduction to Computer Science. Eventually became a Teaching Assistant for Software Design and Documentation.

work.summary: Started off as a front end developer but took on the role of Mentor and then Project Lead.
